documents.document: @PretzelEmpress In our old house we had a wee bit of banister hanging over the stairs and it was fab for drying but sheets & duvet covers. I miss it.

@PoorFrankRaw @typejunky Ironing a bloke’s shirts was one of my part-time jobs when I was at college. I like the smell, end result, etc. it just feels like time stood still tho and I can’t zone out enough during out to relax/think too. Ok with a film.
@jodiekins22 👍🏼👍🏼 Once a week is A LOT. I just about manage once a month apart from for one of the kids to who needs a 2 wk debate on it every time.
@PoorFrankRaw @typejunky Whatever makes you happy is good with me. These are some of the few pleasures we’ll have in Brexitania. https://t.co/3WIn0Eonsm
@WWRBGD Omg yes!!!! 😂😂😂
@TheJoJohnson17 Fair point. I was thinking family wide 🤔
@WWRBGD FUNKY 👃🏼
@nowmrsflynn I fear we’re the same.
@typejunky Its a workout isn’t it? I love your trades. My fave chore is probs hoovering, least fave is folding washing & ironing (we do v little of the latter).
@AnneMac10 Fresh bed vibes! ♥️
@PoorFrankRaw No just being nosey. 👃🏼
@WWRBGD 😂 Those sheets be alive, baby...
@AnneMac10 Thank you :-) How many duvet/sheet sets do you have Anne? I’m just being super nosey & tryna get our laundry shit together.
Domestic poll. How often should bed sheets be changed?
@bethiargh Do we fuck.
I URGENTLY WANT TO #KONMARI EVERYTHING SO 75% OF LIFE BECOMES A SERIES OF JOY SPARKED EXPERIENTIAL ORGASMS https://t.co/Xbt2oK9eF8

And as if by magic after the last RT, this statement appears on my TL; buy this app..... yadda, yadda....
‘So you can be the ultimate work machine’.
Get. To. Fuck. With. That. Bullshit. https://t.co/U6yXnU9zYm

This is an incredible piece. Essential reading for anyone who quid pro quo’s their experience of life with the generations above or after them since 2000, expecting to find equivalence; I’ve been guilty of that, at times - that won’t be happening again. https://t.co/AfTmrW7oK3

@Jessicae13Eaton @TheHeroineColl OMG yes. Especially with my children’s & my health. I’ve been right EVERY TIME but have had to fight walls of being undermined everywhere. A GP even suggested I was imagining my son’s scoliosis so hard that I’d best start anti-depressants. He had two + 50Deg. spinal curves. 🤬
@nortonmum It’s SOOOOOOOO lovely! X
@GinLalli I LOVE THEM GIN 😭😭😭😭😭
Tidying up aside, I don’t think I’ve ever seen such a brilliant family as the Merciers on #MarieKondo’s new Netflix series. Just wow. Beautiful communication & respect. 😭♥️
@DameSparkula I might have sung my heart out to When the Streets Have No Name today. Who can say?
@WWRBGD @DameSparkula @BurnTheBarrel @CastleBitch Mmmmmmmm YUM
@WWRBGD Wonderful! X
Been to see The Favourite at the flicks. Great movie and a refreshing, stylised, segmented structure. Also A+++ use of the adjective cuntstruck. Weisz, Colman & Stone are brilliant in this. 🖤
@IslaAitken Had a black and white Epson-Section, probably shouldn’t do any housework for a few months, just to be on the safe side. 🛏
@xGeorginaGale You go for it :-))
@vicki_valiant Thank you! Feels gorgeous :-)))) xx
@RubbishWife ♥️😂
@TraceyJEmerson You’re very instrumental in this you know. Right place, right time. Helen magic. xx
@PyramidHead76 @Liberator_hen @AndieDelicacy #blessed

@weejamtart My Jackson’s a wee shit! I have to say your one has given me pause a number of times on the name... talk about character dissonance! But I had to stick to it - this particular torag’s been in my head on & off since I was three...
@daveylittle Omg, those rocks! 🖤
@WeeWritingLass @AilishSinclair A treat! Well done :-) If I was you I’d get this into @johnbyrneaward 🖤
@daveylittle Shut your face.... 😂
@parker__farquer At last! Jesus! 😂 https://t.co/M2DCKKCzgW
@LolInKent Fank you! 🥳😘🤓
@daveylittle That’s a bloody fab story! Wow, ok, that size makes sense. Also I would be much more into monarchy if the Queen had wombats in tow instead of corgis. No offence, corgis, obvs.
RT @oceanx: One of the last days of the International Year of the Reef (#iyor18) 😢 📷: @CoralMorph https://t.co/8cNwB04kKh
@mynameisgill @ndmckeown And no matter what they tell you, Nathan, I am not a petty criminal. X
@katebrinkworth When some insane publisher gets broken down by my unrelenting persistence and fires up a printer just to keep me quiet(er) for a while.... 🤞🏼🤞🏼😂😂 🔥🔥🤓🤓
@sarakippford Yes, an almost blank starting face is a family trait. 😂😂😂
@Jem1358 I also can’t wait for that! 💃🏻💃🏻💃🏻♥️♥️♥️
@riverthistle Thank you darling! 🤓😘
@daveylittle I can’t work out the scale. What’re we talking here? Guinea pig size? Black bear? Westie? Go and stand beside it Davey.... 🤔
@BlondieBlonde70 Aw bless you! Was up til 2am watching the man read the ending. 😂😭🖤 x
@RubbishWife Thank you! No stitches! 😂 And a hangover today! X
@ndmckeown Celebrate soon with @mynameisgill and the mini gang hopefully? Xx
@LeTwitteur Well done! The fun is the health secret, I reckon. My spine is literally crying out for exercise after all the ✍🏼 Going to try some yoga & hill walks to start, I think. :-))
@The_Grownup Thank you darling. X

@sarasheridan Obviously crying now (while sitting on my post-birthing rubber ring), thank you for the wonderful words and the incredible example of how to be in novel mode. I’ve a LOT to do in the edit but the plot feels solid. And, at last, A FINISHED BIG OLD STORY! X 💪✍🏼

@katebrinkworth I am! And completely besotted by the characters. 😭♥️😂 Few days off to catch up with friends & try & work out what day it is then diving into the big edit. Terrified, excited and yes, proud. Tis wonderful. X
@JaneCWoods I may hibernate till 2020 now 😂😂 We need to catch up. Wanna hear all yer plans! X
@thebelgianbun Thank you 🙏🏼 xxxx
@Littlelou1975 Thank you sweetheart, that might be a great plan. The big edit to do next! X
@JaneCWoods Thank you! Xxx

@AnnabelWyattArt We’ve got this, Annabel. 🦅
@LeTwitteur Thank you David! Happy new year to you too :-)) Obviously all running has gone by the wayside for now... 😂 how’s yours going?
@breakfast_lady This is exactly the thing. Beginning, middle, end.... never could get it till now! Then ruthless, indulgent polishing. I’m going to edit with @thenovelry’s course. Excited!
@axnicho @rothiemoon Totally. The bullfinch grabbed my heart. Bit in love with them right now. 🖤
@Felixthefemale It would want that for us.

Proud & loved up to announce the birth of my third child. It’s a healthy book, a full first draft, few false starts with delivery, but now settling in beautifully, waiting to be edited. Welcome to the world, Jackson’s Journey, you’ve been a long time coming. Mamma loves you. 🖤 https://t.co/CThdKWvitZ
@mynameisgill @ndmckeown @h__u__e__y CUTEST!!!! X

@frazernh @YoorWullie The Berwickshire Feminists. He was amazing. They all were. RIP.
